metadata.Title: CVE-2017-12961 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - low.
metadata.Description: There is an assertion abort in the function parse_attributes() in data/sys-file-reader.c of the libpspp library in GNU PSPP before 1.0.1 that will lead to remote denial of service.

notes.Note: ratliff> zesty core dumped, xenial errored out

criterions.comment: pspp: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
